RESUMO-CV.TEXTO-RESUMO-CV-RH: Possui doutorado em Economia Aplicada pela University of Illinois at Urbana-Champaign (2012), mestrado em Economia pela University of Illinois at Urbana-Champaign (2009) e graduao em Cincias Econmicas pela Universidade Federal de Pernambuco (2006). Atualmente Professor do Departamento de Economia da Universidade Federal de Pernambuco. Tem experincia na rea de economia da educao, econometria aplicada e desenvolvimento econmico.
RESUMO-CV.TEXTO-RESUMO-CV-RH-EN: Holds a Ph.D. in Applied Economics from the University of Illinois at Urbana- Champaign ( 2012) , MA in Economics from the University of Illinois at Urbana- Champaign (2009 ) and a Bachelors degree in economics from the Federal University of Pernambuco (2006 ). Is currently a Assoaciate Professor of Economics at the Federal University of Pernambuco. Has experience in the field of economics of education, applied econometrics and economic development.
